FuncDef: This command configures the low and high watermark for the number of RADIUS shared filters reporting

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the utilization of the filter ranges for filter entry insertion, at which a table full alarm will be raised by the agent. Values-0 to 8000.
Specifies the utilization of the filter ranges for filter entry insertion, at which a table full alarm will be cleared by the agent. Values-1 to 8000.
